trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> é de propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento é útil quando você deseja exibir um menu de atalho, determinado pelo estado atual da linha ou valores que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento, o menu de atalho que você especificar o manipulador é mostrado sempre que o usuário clica uma linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> substitui o menu de atalho da célula específica que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento também ocorre sempre que o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é recuperada, ou programaticamente ou quando o usuário clica uma linha.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para determinar o estado de uma linha ou valores que ele contém e usar essas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> eventos ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> valor para várias linhas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event is handled to provide a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> based on the title of the employee.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo de código a seguir, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento é manipulado para fornecer uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> com base no título do funcionário.

trans-unit.source: In this example, two there are two context menus, one for managers and one for all other employees.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, há dois são menus de contexto de dois, um para gerentes e outra para todos os outros funcionários.
